column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Lin says : " Welcome home , Avatar .
#Text=Well , I did , but it 's more complicated than you 're making it seem .
#Text=" Lin says : " Mako , I want you back on the beat .
#Text=There 's going to be a Southern Water Tribe peace march tonight .
#Text=I need you there to make sure things do n't get out of hand .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm all yours .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll go too .
#Text=The people of the South need to see that the Avatar is on their side in the fight against the Northern invaders .
#Text=" Lin says : " Great , that should calm them down .
#Text=" Mako says : " Maybe you should sit this out .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I just think having you there blatantly supporting one side will only make things worse .
#Text=You could at least try to seem neutral .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not neutral !
#Text=The North invaded my home .
#Text=The only reason I 'm here is to get the Republic to send troops to help the South .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Zhu Li 's already scheduled a meeting for us with President Raiko tomorrow .
#Text=We 'll get them on board .
#Text=" Mako says : " Whatever , I got ta go to work .
#Text=" Asami says : " I better go check on my factory .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm going to find out about this peace march .
#Text=" Varrick says : " And I am dying for a pedicure .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , um , what should I be doing ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know , Bolin .
#Text=Figure something out .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Say , kid , have you ever seen Republic City at night ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sure , I live here .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Have you really seen it ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Y - no ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's what I thought .
#Text=Come on .
#Text="
